div.head: 呼吸欲絕
div.div: breathing on the verge of interruption

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: breathing on the verge of interruption

sense.def: Illness Sign of difficult breathing as if it were not to continue. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry bai qian 白前： 主上氣衝喉中，呼吸欲絕 , “It controls rising qi rushing into the throat, with breathing on the verge of interruption ”.
